column1: Sharp HealthCare Fiscal Year 2018 Average DRG Charges

column2: In accordance with Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Fiscal Year 2019 Inpatient Prospective Payment System Final Rule, 83 Federal Reg. 41144 (Aug. 17, 2018). Sharp HealthCare publishes their standard charges for each diagnosis-related group (DRG) established under section 1886(d)(4) of the Social Security Act.  These charges were calculated from discharge data for Fiscal Year 2018 (October 1st, 2017 through September 30th, 2018).  Each calculation is the average charge for that DRG within the first standard deviation and are in order from highest occurrence to lowest.  Please be aware this is only an average calculation and that every visit is different.  Please note that standard charges are not always reflective of the price you will pay for the services provided. You can obtain a price estimate by calling our centralized price estimate line at 858-499-5901.

In accordance with Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Fiscal Year 2019 Inpatient Prospective Payment System Final Rule, 83 Federal Reg. 41144 (Aug. 17, 2018). Sharp HealthCare publishes their standard charges for each diagnosis-related group (DRG) established under section 1886(d)(4) of the Social Security Act.  These charges were calculated from discharge data for Fiscal Year 2018 (October 1st, 2017 through September 30th, 2018).  Each calculation is the average charge for that DRG within the first standard deviation and are in order from highest occurrence to lowest.  Please be aware this is only an average calculation and that every visit is different.  Please note that standard charges are not always reflective of the price you will pay for the services provided. You can obtain a price estimate by calling our centralized price estimate line at 858-499-5901.
